plurals.name: accessibility_recent_task_enter
plurals.item: An bude kawanan nan, manhajar da akwai: %d.
An bude kawanan nan, manhajar da akwai: %d.

plurals.name: accessibility_recent_task_first_enter_tips
plurals.item: Wanda aka bude Kwanan nan, manhajar da akwai: %d. Ja ta sama ka cire, jawo ta kasa ka kulle.
Wanda aka bude Kwanan nan, manhajar da akwai: %d. Ja ta sama ka cire, jawo ta kasa ka kulle.

plurals.name: incorrect_pincode_remaining_attempts
plurals.item: Lambar PIN bai daidai,kokarin shiga %d ya saura
Lambar PIN bai daidai, kokarin shiga %d ya saura

plurals.name: incorrect_pukcode_remaining_attempts
plurals.item: Lambar PUK bai daidai, kokarin shiga %d ya saura
Lambar PUK bai daidai, kokarin shiga %d ya saura

plurals.name: input_password_after_timeout_msg
plurals.item: Ba ka yi amfani da kalmar sirrinka ba a kalla ma awowi %d. Sa kalmar sirrinka.
Ba ka yi amfani da kalmar sirrinka ba a kalla ma awa %d. Sa kalmar sirrinka.

plurals.name: input_pattern_after_timeout_msg
plurals.item: Ba ka yi amfani da zanen sirrinka na budewa ba a kalla ma awowi %d. Sa kalmar sirrinka.
Ba ka yi amfani da zanen sirrinka na budewa ba a kalla ma awa %d. Sa kalmar sirrinka.

plurals.name: kg_password_default_pin_message
plurals.item: Sa lambar PIN na Layin waya, da sauran kokarin budewa %d.
"Sa lambar PIN na Layin waya, da sauran kokarin budewa %d kafin ya zama dole ka tuntubi kamfanin sadarwarka don bude na'urarka."

plurals.name: kg_password_default_puk_message
plurals.item: Layin waya ya bude a yanzu. Sa lambar PUK ka ci gaba. Da sauran kokarin budewa %d kafin a kasa aiki kwata kwata da Layin wayar. Tuntubi kamfanin sadarwarka don ka samu cikakken bayani.
Layin waya ya bude a yanzu. Sa lambar PUK ka ci gaba. Da sauran kokarin budewa %d kafin a kasa aiki kwata kwata da Layin wayar. Tuntubi kamfanin sadarwarka don ka samu cikakken bayani.

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_pin_code
plurals.item: Lambar PIN na Layin wayar bai daidai, da sauran koakrin budewa %d.
"Lambar PIN na Layin wayar bai daidai, da sauran koakrin budewa %d kafin ya zama dole ku tuntubi kamfanin sadarwarku don bude na'urar."

plurals.name: kg_password_wrong_puk_code
plurals.item: Lambar PUK na Layin wayar bai daidai, da sauran koakrin budewa %d kafin a kasa amfani da kwata kwata.
Lambar PUK na Layin wayar bai daidai, da sauran koakrin budewa %d kafin a kasa amfani da kwata kwata.

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_password
plurals.item: "An bude na'urar ma awowi %d. Tabbatar da kalmar sirri."
"An bude na'urar ma awa %d. Tabbatar da kalmar sirri."

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_pattern
plurals.item: "An bude na'urar ma awowi %d. Tabbatar da zanen sirri."
"An bude na'urar ma awa %d. Tabbatar da zanen sirri."

plurals.name: kg_prompt_reason_time_pin
plurals.item: "An bude na'urar ma awowi %d. Tabbatar da lambar PIN."
"An bude na'urar ma awa %d. Tabbatar da lambar PIN."

plurals.name: notification_num_channels_desc
plurals.item: 1 daga cikin sanarwa %d na wannan manhaja
1 daga cikin sanarwa %d na wannan manhaja

plurals.name: settings_toggle_position_divider_page
plurals.item: Makunni %1$d dake a sama na kunne
